alert.note: Alert for Meeker; Stearns (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 09 at 12:43AM CDT until September 09 at 1:00AM CDT by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 100 AM CDT FOR NORTHWESTERN MEEKER AND SOUTH CENTRAL STEARNS COUNTIES... At 1243 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Paynesville, or 19 miles northeast of Willmar, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of northwestern Meeker and south central Stearns Counties, including the following locations... Manannah, Lake Koronis Regional Park and Paynesville Airport. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
